modShortDescription: Ever wish you could use those nice looking ammo/weapons/food/medical piles and those new A19 containers found in POIs as lockable containers in your base?
modDescription:
Ever wish you could use those nice looking ammo/weapons/food/medical piles and those new A19 containers found in POIs as lockable containers in your base? Well now you can with Laz Man’s latest mod. Enjoy!

**v1.3**

* Updated for A19 Compatibility (A19.1 B4)  
   * block name change from “woodFurnitureBlockVariantHelper” to “cntwoodFurnitureBlockVariantHelper”  
   * block name change from “cntAmmoPileSmall\_02” to “cntAmmoPileSmall\_storage”  
   * block name change from “cntAmmoPileMedium\_02” to “cntAmmoPileMedium\_storage”  
   * block name change from “cntAmmoPileLarge\_02” to “cntAmmoPileLarge\_storage”  
   * block name change from “cntWeaponsBagSmall\_02” to “cntWeaponsBagSmall\_storage”  
   * block name change from “cntWeaponsBagLarge\_02” to “cntWeaponsBagLarge\_storage”  
   * block name change from “cntFoodPileSmall\_02” to “cntFoodPileSmall\_storage”  
   * block name change from “cntFoodPileMedium\_02” to “cntFoodPileMedium\_storage”  
   * block name change from “cntFoodPileLarge\_02” to “cntFoodPileLarge\_storage”  
   * block name change from “cntMedicLootPileA\_02” to “cntMedicLootPileA\_storage”  
   * block name change from “cntMedicLootPileB\_02” to “cntMedicLootPileB\_storage”
* Added the following 43 blocks as additional lockable containers within the shape selector for the existing vanilla Storage Container / Furniture block.  
   * cntBookShelfSingleBottomFull01\_storage  
   * cntBookShelfSingleBottomFull02\_storage  
   * cntBookShelfSingleTopFull01\_storage  
   * cntBookShelfSingleTopFull02\_storage  
   * cntGunRackLargeGuns01\_storage  
   * cntGunRackLargeGuns02\_storage  
   * cntGunRackSmallArmor\_storage  
   * cntGunRackSmallMagazines\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfSingleTopHardware01\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfSingleTopHardware02\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfSingleBottomHardware01\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfSingleBottomHardware02\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfSingleTopFood01\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfSingleBottomFood01\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfSingleBottomFood02\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfSingleBottomPharmaGoods01\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfSingleBottomPharmaGoods02\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfElectronicsSingleBottomPC\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfElectronicsSingleBottomElectronicsMonitor\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfElectronicsSingleBottomGoodsMisc\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfElectronicsSingleBottomHeadphones\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfElectronicsSingleBottomKeyboard\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfElectronicsSingleBottomLaptopOpen\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfElectronicsSingleBottomLaptopClosed\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfElectronicsSingleBottomSpeaker\_storage  
   * cntClothesShelfHalfJeans01\_storage  
   * cntClothesShelfHalfJeans02\_storage  
   * cntClothesShelfHalfShirts01\_storage  
   * cntClothesShelfHalfShirts02\_storage  
   * cntClothesShelfHalfSweaters01\_storage  
   * cntClothesShelfStackJeans01\_storage  
   * cntClothesShelfStackJeans02\_storage  
   * cntClothesShelfStackShirts01\_storage  
   * cntClothesShelfStackShirts02\_storage  
   * cntClothesRackRoundPants\_storage  
   * cntClothesRackRoundShirts\_storage  
   * cntClothesRackRectanglePants\_storage  
   * cntClothesRackRectangleShirts\_storage  
   * cntClothesRackWallPants\_storage  
   * cntClothesRackWallLongSleeve\_storage  
   * cntClothesRackWallSweater\_storage  
   * cntClothesRackWallTShirts\_storage  
   * cntStoreShelfSingleBottomShoesFull\_storage

**v1.2:** Added the following blocks as additional lockable containers within the shape selector for the existing vanilla Storage Container / Furniture block.

* cntFoodPileSmall\_02
* cntFoodPileMedium\_02
* cntFoodPileLarge\_02
* cntMedicLootPileA\_02
* cntMedicLootPileB\_02

**v1.1:** Added the following blocks as additional lockable containers within the shape selector for the existing vanilla [Storage](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-storage/) Container / Furniture block.

* cntWeaponsBagSmall\_02
* cntWeaponsBagLarge\_02

Adjusted HP for all Ammo/Weapons Bag containers to 225.

**v1.0:** Adds the following blocks as alternate lockable containers within the shape selector for the existing vanilla Storage Container / Furniture block.

* cntAmmoPileSmall\_02
* cntAmmoPileMedium\_02
* cntAmmoPileLarge\_02

**Note:** This mod creates new ammo/weapons/food/medical blocks so those within POIs are not impacted.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fy74uv0Pv6yEPzZjoHjfhWKpecYOihaW/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17240-laz-mans-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Laz Man](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/laz-man/)
